content: this tree is created as one piece and then stuffed to keep it rigid and upright you can decorate as in picture 2 or create a different look with your imagination this tree will make a centerpiece for your christmas table or just a nice decoration for your house or office it stands at five inches tall and two inches in diameter at the base it is decorated with pearl ended pins stuck in but if you have children around you may want to sew or glue the beads on **this pattern has been revised as of september 5 2010 please download a new copy of the pattern**
